title: FS: Lower Grade T206 Lot w/ Many HOF'ers *PRICE DROP*
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lower Grade T206 Lot w/ Many HOF'ers *PRICE DROP*
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following lot of T206's available for sale.  As you can see by the scans, most of these cards are lower grade.  Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards.  I will cover shipping for 3 or more cards.  Payment via any method you prefer.  I'd also gladly consider trades.  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve and cards or with questions.  Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards for easier viewing):

Bliss - $13
H. Davis - $11
Dygert - $20
Egan SGC 10 - $18
Elberfeld (Fac 42 overprint back) - $18

Marc, I will take both the Huggins please.

Thanks!

Ill take Kelley HOF - $25
Whats your Paypal address. Thanks
One bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks to all who have been interested so far.  Please e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve any cards.

Marc,

I received the T206 Huggins cards today.  They look awesome!  Thanks again for the great service!

Chris
